message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $10000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a special price I'm only offering you, as I know you have a discerning eye for quality. Let me know your thoughts, and we can discuss the details further.
